channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fridge freezer and printer, 24th June
item.description:
Items dumped at station end of Troughton Road. Frequent fly tipping here which seems to be at night. Need cameras, signs and prosecutions.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Troughton Road, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
